author: satyajitsato
content:
Question related to Cancun:
For block number based hardforks, while testing locally, we can simply set a block number in genesis.json file and the hardfork will occur after that many blocks have been formed. How can I easily do that for time based hardfork like cancunTime? Every time I run it I need to set a new value which will be current time + few mins.
Is there an easy way to do it so that I don't need to keep changing any value and cancun hardfork will occur after few blocks only? Thanks!

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: No easy way, but you can use the --override.cancun flag (Not 100% sure if it's available already) so you don't need to update the genesis every time
